titleStmt.title: At the blew Ball in Haydon yard in the Little Minories, London, near the Tower, liveth one Mr. Elmy, operator, who in a most excellent manner cureth all sorts of deafness in any, from the age of seven to fourscore years, ...
titleStmt.author: Elmy, Mr.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
